edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Question
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClosedQuestion, OpenQuestion

    public class Question
extends PageItem
    This class is a subclass of PageItem and represents a question on the page.
